main.*:
[[File:Hootie.jpg|thumb]]'''Hootie and the Blowfish '''are an American pop rock band.

[[Ross Geller]] is a fan of the band, and his friends buy him tickets to one of their shows as a birthday gift in "[[The One With Five Steaks And An Eggplant]]". He attends with [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] and [[Monica Geller|Monica]], while [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]], [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]], and [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] stay home due to feelings of inadequacy. 

After the show, Monica runs into [[Steven Fisher]], who she used to babysit and whose firm now represents the band. He takes the three friends backstage, where they party with the band, and Monica gets a hickey from making out with one of the band members.

The band is only mentioned, none of the musicians are actually seen in the episode.
